ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: or do they help you or do you harm?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or do they benefit you, or do you harm?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: or do they cause you any benefit or harm?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He asked them, "Can the idols hear you when you pray to them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Or do they benefit you or harm you?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or do they benefit you or do they cause harm"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or do they profit you or cause you harm?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: or do they profit you, or harm?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or do they benefit or harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they help or harm you?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or, benefit they you or hurt they you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Or do they bring you any benefit, or cause you any harm?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or do you good or harm?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or do they benefit you or do they harm (you)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Can they benefit you or harm you'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do they benefit you, or harm you?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:73] Or do they bring you benefit, when you worship them, or harm?, to you, if you do not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or do they benefit) you in your livelihood when you obey them (or harm you) in your livelihood when you disobey them?
